trans-unit.source: Represents a UDP binding.
trans-unit.target: 表示 UDP 繫結。

trans-unit.source: The UdpBinding cannot be used with a WAS-hosted (Windows Process Activation Services) service.
trans-unit.target: UdpBinding 不能與 WAS 裝載 （Windows 處理序啟用服務） 服務。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.UdpBinding"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ServiceModel.UdpBinding"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.UdpBinding"></xref> class with a specified configuration name.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ServiceModel.UdpBinding"></xref>具有指定之組態名稱的類別。

trans-unit.source: The configuration name.
trans-unit.target: 組態名稱。

trans-unit.source: Creates a collection of binding elements.
trans-unit.target: 建立繫結項目的集合。

trans-unit.source: A collection of binding elements.
trans-unit.target: 繫結項目的集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the duplicate message history length in a UDP binding element.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 UDP 繫結項目中的重複訊息記錄長度的值。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of message hashes used by the binding to identify duplicate messages.
trans-unit.target: 繫結用於識別重複訊息的訊息雜湊數目上限。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a maximum buffer pool size associated with the binding.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定繫結相關聯的最大緩衝區集區大小。

trans-unit.source: A number that indicates the size of a buffer pool.
trans-unit.target: 此數字表示緩衝集區的大小。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum number of messages that are received but not yet removed from the input queue for an individual channel instance.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定已接收但尚未從個別通道執行個體的輸入佇列移除的訊息數目上限。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of pending messages.
trans-unit.target: 暫止訊息最大數目。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum size for a message that can be processed by the binding.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定可以由繫結處理的訊息大小上限。

trans-unit.source: The maximum size for a message that can be processed by the binding.
trans-unit.target: 可以繫結所處理的訊息大小上限。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum number of retransmit messages in a UDP binding.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 UDP 繫結中的最大重新傳輸訊息數。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of retransmit messages in a UDP binding.
trans-unit.target: 在 UDP 繫結中重新傳送訊息的數目上限。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the MulticastInterfaceID property in a UDP binding.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 UDP 繫結中 MulticastInterfaceID 屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: The network adapter that is used when sending and receiving multicast traffic on multi-honed machines.
trans-unit.target: 網路介面卡傳送及接收多重主目錄電腦上的多點傳送的流量時使用。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the reader quotas.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定讀取器配額。

trans-unit.source: The reader quotas.
trans-unit.target: 讀取器配額。

trans-unit.source: Gets the scheme name for this binding.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個繫結的配置名稱。

trans-unit.source: The scheme name for this binding.
trans-unit.target: 這個繫結的配置名稱。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the ReaderQuotas should be serialized.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，指出是否應該序列化 ReaderQuotas。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> if the ReaderQuotas should be serialized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref>如果應該序列化 ReaderQuotas;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether settings for text encoding should be serialized.
trans-unit.target: 傳回是否應序列化文字編碼方式的設定。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> if the settings for text encoding should be serialized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref>如果應序列化文字編碼方式的設定。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether incoming requests are handled synchronously or asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出要以同步或非同步方式處理傳入要求。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> if incoming requests are handled synchronously; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref>如果要以同步方式; 處理傳入要求否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text encoding that is used for the binding.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用來繫結的文字編碼方式。

trans-unit.source: The text encoding.
trans-unit.target: 文字編碼方式。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the TimeToLive property in a UDP binding.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 UDP 繫結中的 TimeToLive 屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: The number of network segment hops that a multicast packet can traverse.
trans-unit.target: 多點傳送封包可以周遊的網路區段躍點數目。
